All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ActiveActor
Represents a movable actor with an image.
ActiveActorDestructible
Represents a destructible actor that can be destroyed in the game.
AlertUtil
Utility class to show various types of alerts in a JavaFX application.
AppConstants
This class contains constant values used in the Sky Battle game.
AttackSpeedPowerUp
Represents a power-up item that increases the attack speed of the player.
BossPlane
The BossPlane class represents a powerful boss fighter plane.
BossPlane1
The BossPlane class represents a powerful boss fighter plane.
BossProjectile
Represents a projectile fired by the BossPlane.
BossProjectile1
Represents a projectile fired by the BossPlane.
BossProjectile2
Represents a projectile fired by the BossPlane.
Destructible
Interface for entities that can take damage and be destroyed.
EnemyPlane
The EnemyPlane class represents an enemy aircraft.
EnemyPlane1
The EnemyPlane class represents an enemy aircraft.
EnemyProjectile
Represents a projectile fired by an enemy plane.
ExplosionEffect
ExplosionEffect class represents the static explosion image with some special effects.
GameController
Manages game flow and handles transitions between levels.
GameOverImage
Displays the "Game Over" image when the game ends.
GameStartScreen
Represents the game's start screen with background and buttons.
HealthBar
 
HeartDisplay
Manages and displays heart images representing the player's health.
HeartImage
Displays the "Heart" image representing the player's health.
HeartPowerUp
Represents a power-up item that increases the player's health.
ImageConstants
This class defines constant values related to image resources in the Sky Battle game.
ImageFactory
A factory class for creating instances of Image.
ImageUtil
Utility class providing methods for creating and displaying images.
LevelFactory
A factory class for creating instances of game levels.
LevelFour
Represents the fourth level in the Sky Battle game.
LevelLoadingException
Thrown when a game level cannot be loaded properly, such as due to missing classes or reflection issues.
LevelOne
Represents the first level of the Sky Battle game.
LevelParent
Abstract class that represents a game level.
LevelThree
Represents the third level in the Sky Battle game.
LevelTwo
Represents the third level in the Sky Battle game.
LevelUtil
Manages the flow of levels in the game, including advancing to the next level and checking if it's the final level.
LevelView
Manages graphical elements for a game level, including health display, win, and game over images.
LoadingImage
Displays the "Loading" image when the game ends.
Main
Main Entry Point of the Program in the JavaFX Framework.
MusicUtil
Utility class for managing music and sound effects in the Sky Battle game.
Plane
The Plane class represents a fighter plane.
PowerUpItem
Represents a power-up item in the game.
PowerUpManager
Manages the generation and dropping of power-up items during gameplay.
Projectile
Represents a general projectile in the game, fired by actors like planes.
ShieldImage
Represents the shield image of actors in the game.
TargetDisplay
Manages and displays heart images representing the player's health.
UserInputHandle
Handles user input for the game, such as plane movement and projectile firing.
UserPlane
The UserPlane class represents the player's plane.
UserProjectile
Represents a projectile fired by the user's plane.
WinImage
Represents the "You Win" image displayed when the player wins.
